thread.title: Mr. Glenn Brooks
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mr. Glenn Brooks

author: Mr. Glenn Brooks
title: Mr. Glenn Brooks
text: I've used Blinds2go a few times now and have to say they are probably the best manufacturer and supplier of Blinds in the UK. Their products are very high quality and made to measure, plus extremely easy to install. Pricing is very also excellent and are extreme value for money.
